scripts.watch:css: chokidar "content_feeds/templates/content_feeds/*.html" "templates/*.html" "templates/account/*.html" "user_profile/templates/user_profile/*.html" "user_submissions/templates/user_submissions/*.html" -c "npx tailwindcss build static/src/style.css -o static/css/style.css && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput"
